QuestData.Title: The Handmaiden's Tale
QuestData.Description: The Javelins of Suramar!$b$bWielded by Azshara herself, they contain immense magical power. She has always had a fondness for bestowing favors on her favorites, but I never suspected she would give one something so valuable as one of her Javelins. This foe must be formidable indeed.$b$bNevertheless, $n, we cannot let this opportunity pass us. Defeat the handmaiden and retrieve the relic!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: One of Queen Azshara's personal handmaidens, she has been trusted with one of the powerful Javelins of Suramar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Thalyssra in the ruins above Elun'alor Temple.
